they created an event in school and invited all student to show off how its works.

it become Famous in Austria , Much cards Much trusts and Much connections.

day per day he become against of â€œTrust-meâ€ , he started drinking and bad thinking about Mark Zesus and his Trust-me.

San brow was went to out of city , Mark zesus Dropped Gift to his neighborhood and said â€ when San brow comes in city, give this Gift to himâ€.

27 December , Sanâ€™s Neighborhood saw news paper that Mark zesus has been Dead. He went to san-browâ€™s Home.

San was Doing Breakfast, San brow saw the news paper , but still San-brow was Behaved Like he donâ€™t know anything.

when San brow opened His Gift Gifted By mark zesus, There was a paper of trust-me, Mark zesus was written

he did supported trust-me and best part in success of Trust-me.

San-Brow Felt Guilty, Next day Police visited to San browâ€™s Home. San Browâ€™s did Arrested in the case of Murder of Mark zesus.

San Bro Felt Guilty, Next day Police visited to San browâ€™s Home amd Arrested in the case of Murder of Mark zesus,

Due to This case Government ordered to Close that service!!

It is 2011, a modern world ,

people need a social media something Like â€œTrust-meâ€  .

difference between Trust me and trustship is

â€œtrustmeâ€ was working offline but Trustship works Everything online on a Internet page.
